issue.title: [CF 414] Change the way the icon flash or/and add a feature
issue.body:
Greetings!

I am runnung 4.7.3 version of TMW. I tried to set up icon flash, but I haven't found a way how to flash it not in color, but completely. Sorry, I not that good in english, so I have recorded 2 short movies to illustrate what I mean.

This one is how it set up now - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AZRWbFHgtn8
This one is how it should be set up - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8zqckWS2_8k

So,
1. It would be great if you can add a feature to make the icon flash in that way I have just showed.
2. Please add a checkbox for animation duration that will make animation work forever, not only a max of 10 secs.

TMW rocks! Thank you!


> Posted by CurseForge user rokker9 | Imported from CurseForge issue #414 | Raw

comments.body:
Added Icon: Alpha Flash to r404

I will look into some sort of implementation for animations that don't expire.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Added the ability to play an animation indefinitely in r405.

Let me know if anything is still left to be desired.
